ComicInfo.Summary:
A man finds the secret of eternal life, but he doesn't anticipate it as being the recipient of the vampire's kiss.
When the Black Death hits the town in which he lives, Donald decides to hole up in his home for the duration, but thinks better of it when loneliness hits him hard. He and another friend decide to invite non-plague carriers to a special party, where they meet a beautiful girl. Soon Donald discovers that beauty is only skin deep......so to speak!
ComicInfo.Title: The Village Graveyard; The Face of Death!; The Miser; The Passenger; The Man Who Lost His Head
ComicInfo.Penciller: Russ Heath,Bill Everett,Bill La Cava,Martin Rosenthall,Tom Gill
ComicInfo.Inker: Russ Heath,Bill Everett,Bill La Cava,Martin Rosenthall,Tom Gill
